forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...showers and thundershowers during the morning, then mainly cloudy this afternoon with periods of light rain developing. High 12C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy...showers and thundershowers this morning, then mostly cloudy with light rain possible this afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with light rain and showers. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then becoming windy with a steady light rain overnight. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds W at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Periods of light rain early. Low 4C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Periods of light rain early. Low 39F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 46F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 35F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
